name: HUDK4011 Fall 2018 Discussion of Addictive Linking by Peter Brusilovsky
description: As you listen to Professor Brusilovsky discuss his latest work on adaptive systems, consider how you might use these technologies in your design project for the course. In particular, consider the value of addictive linking for student engagement and motivation.

description: Discuss the implications of the collaboration that built and maintains Wikipedia for the development of networked educational resources and institutions.

description: How can the kind of learning networks discussed by Will Richardson play a role in a new educational system?

description: We think itâ€™s necessary to design an online professional course for teachers in UAE public primary schools, who are or will be engaged in coeducation. Our goal is to teach them how to guide both students and parents get used to the mixed classes and to benefit from it. We will provide teachers with academic knowledge and practical opportunity in terms of healthy gender development.
